content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Celta de Vigo 2.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Celta de Vigo 2.
Corner,  Celta de Vigo. Conceded by Wellington Silva.
Augusto Fernández (Celta de Vigo) hits the left post with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Fabián Orellana with a cross following a set piece situation.
Thomas Partey (Almería) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Michael Krohn-Dehli (Celta de Vigo) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Thomas Partey (Almería).

Goal!  Almería 2, Celta de Vigo 2. Jonathan (Almería) right footed shot from very close range to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Tomer Hemed following a set piece situation.
Santi Mina (Celta de Vigo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
